name: Crack Out
overview: An Arkanoid style bat and ball game, created in AMOS by C. Hodges that was originally released to public domain in 1992, the 1.4 update was released on October 30, 1997. The game features what some would call sideways play as the bat is on the right side of the screen and the brick configuration is on the left, rather than the traditional top and bottom arrangement.
